title: OsloTour
description: Fully fledged tourism application for android.
detailed: Fully fledged tourism application for android. The app displays available activities in the city of Oslo, all while accounting for the current weather conditions. It does this using weather data from Metrologisk Institutt (MET) along with place/map data from various Google APIs. Architectural pattern used is MVVM. This project was a team effort.
features: Find fitting activities in Oslo based on weather conditions
Essential data is cached on your device

title: My portfolio
description: My brand new portfolio, created with the Gatsby ecosystem.
detailed: My brand new portfolio, created with the Gatsby ecosystem. The site consist of both a blog created from Markdown (.md) files, and project data sourced from JSON. The data is made available through Gatsby's GraphQL API, which is then queried at build time to programatically create pages.

title: Frontspring
description: Site built by creating a custom Wordpress theme.
detailed: My first project creating a custom Wordpress theme. The theme is split up into several 'blocks' which are reused throughout the site. All content on the page is fully editable on the Wordpress dashboard (ACF). Majority of the site graphics are created by me in Adobe Illustrator.

title: Movie library
description: React application utlizing the OMDB API.
detailed: React application utilizing the OMDB API. The application lets you search through the movies in the database, as well as providing details about each individual movie. The API-calls are relayed through a Node webserver.

title: Example project
detailed: This is an example project, very cool.
